company_info.Company Description: The company and its affiliates develop, manufacture, and distribute high quality kitchenware headquartered in the USA.The company has grown rapidly to become the world leader in kitchen innovation & cookware manufacturing. Their manufacturing spread across the globe creates over 100 cookware lines that are distributed in over 40 countries.The company is seeking positive and dedicated people to join their team across India.If you are looking for a dynamic work environment full of opportunities for professional development and individual growth, this would be a good opportunity.The company is committed to acknowledge and reward performance and achievements throughout the entire company.
company_info.Company Name: CONSIUS IT CONSULTING AND HR SERVICES PVT LTD
